4304330.name: Taxi Path
4304330.description:
What am I doing here?

Taxicab is an atmospheric driving game. You've just arrived in a city where for some reason it always rains. Work as a taxi driver. Relax, take some orders and just drive around. Let your mind to speak.

Who are these people?

Every passenger has something to say. Their story, ideas or problems in life. Some of them will be funny, some of them you could relate to, some might make you regret taking this job. All you can do is listen. Or not. You decide.

Features

  • Drive around the city

  • Retro graphics

  • Listen passengers stories

  • Music player with drum and bass jungle beats!
4304330.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
